game.description: Help the villagers of Mystwood recover their lost belongings from the rogue trolls.
game.objective: Retrieve the lost belongings of the villagers from the cave of the trolls. Show them that the inhabitants of Mystwood are not to be trifled with.

tasks.description: Explore the forest and find the hidden cave of the trolls.
Recover the townsfolk's belongings without alerting the trolls.
Return to Elden with the recovered belongings.

game.title: The Lost Belongings of Mystwood
